00011 const double Watchdog::kDefaultWatchdogExpiration;
00012 
00016 Watchdog::Watchdog()
00017     :   m_fpgaWatchDog(NULL)
00018 {
00019     m_fpgaWatchDog = new tWatchdog(&status);
00020     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00021     SetExpiration(kDefaultWatchdogExpiration);
00022     SetEnabled(true);
00023 }
00024 
00028 Watchdog::~Watchdog()
00029 {
00030     SetEnabled(false);
00031     delete m_fpgaWatchDog;
00032     m_fpgaWatchDog = NULL;
00033 }
00034 
00047 bool Watchdog::Feed()
00048 {
00049     bool previous = GetEnabled();
00050     m_fpgaWatchDog->strobeFeed(&status);
00051     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00052     return previous;
00053 }
00054 
00061 void Watchdog::Kill()
00062 {
00063     m_fpgaWatchDog->strobeKill(&status);
00064     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00065 }
00066 
00072 double Watchdog::GetTimer()
00073 {
00074     UINT32 timer = m_fpgaWatchDog->readTimer(&status);
00075     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00076     return timer / (kSystemClockTicksPerMicrosecond * 1e6);
00077 }
00078 
00084 double Watchdog::GetExpiration()
00085 {
00086     UINT32 expiration = m_fpgaWatchDog->readExpiration(&status);
00087     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00088     return expiration / (kSystemClockTicksPerMicrosecond * 1e6);
00089 }
00090 
00096 void Watchdog::SetExpiration(double expiration)
00097 {
00098     m_fpgaWatchDog->writeExpiration((UINT32)(expiration * (kSystemClockTicksPerMicrosecond * 1e6)), &status);
00099     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00100 }
00101 
00107 bool Watchdog::GetEnabled()
00108 {
00109     bool enabled = !m_fpgaWatchDog->readImmortal(&status);
00110     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00111     return enabled;
00112 }
00113 
00126 void Watchdog::SetEnabled(bool enabled)
00127 {
00128     m_fpgaWatchDog->writeImmortal(!enabled, &status);
00129     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00130 }
00131 
00144 bool Watchdog::IsAlive()
00145 {
00146     bool alive = m_fpgaWatchDog->readStatus_Alive(&status);
00147     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00148     return alive;
00149 }
00150 
00156 bool Watchdog::IsSystemActive()
00157 {
00158     bool alive = m_fpgaWatchDog->readStatus_SystemActive(&status);
00159     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00160     return alive;
00161 }
